info.task: navigate from expanded disclosure button to current page link
info.title: Navigate from an expanded disclosure button to the current page link in interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToAndExpandFirstDisclosureAndSetCurrentPage
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first disclosure button, sets its state to expanded, and marks the first link in the associated dropdown as being the current page

user: With focus on the first disclosure button in the navigation region, move into the button's associated list of links.
instructions.raw: With focus on the first disclosure button in the navigation region, move into the button's associated list of links.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: Role of the dropdown ('list') is conveyed
Number of items in the dropdown (4) is conveyed
Role of the first item in the dropdown ('link') is conveyed
Name of the first item in the dropdown ('Overview') is conveyed
State of the first item in the dropdown (as the current page) is conveyed
